A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was not a fantastic movie by any stretch\, nor is it a great story. There are so many blunders that outweigh the great few moments. Many totally unnecessary scenes and sequences that contribute nothing to the film. Moments of ridiculous marvel-esque humor that ruins many good moments. Disney is really doing a number on Star Wars.My biggest issue with rotten tomatoes nowadays is the critics  no accolades or any kind of storytelling background. Yet\, they are the ones deciding what a good movie is\, it's ridiculous.
